name: Variant 02 Onigiri [ Plooshie 22 ]
description:
Inspired on a character... you should know who!

1000x1000 MP4

About Plooshies

Plooshies is a collection in memory of the more than one hundred plushies I crafted 11 years ago... and they sold out back then!  I cut, stuffed and stitched by hand, each one of them. With a ton of love and dedication. 

I hope you love this collection as much as I do, where each Plooshie is made with <3
